title: 'Bachelorette' Star Ali Fedotowsky Pulls a Demi Lovato & Proudly Shows Off 'Flaw'
text:
Sep 6, 2019 at 16:29 pm UTCBy Whitney Vasquez

Former "Bachelorette" star Ali Fedotowsky is embracing her so-called "flaw" and doing so with a powerful statement, just like Demi Lovato.

The social media influencer spoke from the heart in her most recent Instagram post about her body after kids.

Ali shared that she's been self-conscious of her stomach after having her two babies, but she's done with that and is now embracing her changing body.

Sitting in the pool with her kids -- Molly, 3, and Riley, 1, -- the ABC star showcased her tummy proudly.

"I look at my tummy and then I look at his smiling face and just like that, in my eyes, my so called “flaw” becomes my greatest gift," the 34-year-old wrote.

Ali's nearly 750,000 followers are singing her praises for her confidence and wise words.

"I don’t see any flaws babe. I see a body that grew humans!!!" a fan wrote. "You are beautiful! And I see hard work in that tummy!" said another.

Others are thanking Ali for having the courage to speak out.

"I needed this reminder! Thank you!" commented one follower. "Thanks for being real. Makes the rest of us feel beautiful in this photoshopped and edited world," added another fan.

Ali shared her post hours before Demi Lovato uploadedan unedited snapof herself showing cellulite.

Saying she's so "tired of being ashamed of my body," Lovato added, "This is what I got."

The singer wrote that she's changing her outlook and not succumbing to pressures of what others think is beautiful.

"So here’s me, unashamed, unafraid and proud to own a body that has fought through so much," she proudly stated.

Lovato's post gained attention and praise from superstars likeJamie Lee Curtis,Ashley GrahamandHailey Bieber.
description: 'Bachelorette' star Ali Fedotowsky shows off her 'flaw' while wearing her swimsuit.
